00193 int
00194 Cudd_PrintMinterm(
00195   DdManager * manager,
00196   DdNode * node)
00197 {
00198     int         i, *list;
00199 
00200     background = manager->background;
00201     zero = Cudd_Not(manager->one);
00202     list = ALLOC(int,manager->size);
00203     if (list == NULL) {
00204         manager->errorCode = CUDD_MEMORY_OUT;
00205         return(0);
00206     }
00207     for (i = 0; i < manager->size; i++) list[i] = 2;
00208     ddPrintMintermAux(manager,node,list);
00209     FREE(list);
00210     return(1);
00211 
00212 } /* end of Cudd_PrintMinterm */

00240 int
00241 Cudd_PrintDebug(
00242   DdManager * dd,
00243   DdNode * f,
00244   int  n,
00245   int  pr)
00246 {
00247     DdNode *azero, *bzero;
00248     int    nodes;
00249     int    leaves;
00250     double minterms;
00251     int    retval = 1;
00252 
00253     if (f == NULL) {
00254         (void) fprintf(stdout,": is the NULL DD\n");
00255         (void) fflush(stdout);
00256         return(0);
00257     }
00258     azero = DD_ZERO(dd);
00259     bzero = Cudd_Not(DD_ONE(dd));
00260     if ((f == azero || f == bzero) && pr > 0){
00261        (void) fprintf(stdout,": is the zero DD\n");
00262        (void) fflush(stdout);
00263        return(1);
00264     }
00265     if (pr > 0) {
00266         nodes = Cudd_DagSize(f);
00267         if (nodes == CUDD_OUT_OF_MEM) retval = 0;
00268         leaves = Cudd_CountLeaves(f);
00269         if (leaves == CUDD_OUT_OF_MEM) retval = 0;
00270         minterms = Cudd_CountMinterm(dd, f, n);
00271         if (minterms == (double)CUDD_OUT_OF_MEM) retval = 0;
00272         (void) fprintf(stdout,": %d nodes %d leaves %g minterms\n", nodes, leaves,
00273             minterms);
00274         if (pr > 2) {
00275             if (!cuddP(dd, f)) retval = 0;
00276         }
00277         if (pr == 2 || pr > 3) {
00278             if (!Cudd_PrintMinterm(dd,f)) retval = 0;
00279             (void) fprintf(stdout,"\n");
00280         }
00281         (void) fflush(stdout);
00282     }
00283     return(retval);
00284 
00285 } /* end of Cudd_PrintDebug */

00402 Cudd_SharingSize(
00403   DdNode ** nodeArray,
00404   int  n)
00405 {
00406     int i,j;    
00407 
00408     i = 0;
00409     for (j = 0; j < n; j++) {
00410         i += ddDagInt(Cudd_Regular(nodeArray[j]));

00412     for (j = 0; j < n; j++) {

00435 double
00436 Cudd_CountMinterm(
00437   DdManager * manager,
00438   DdNode * node,
00439   int  nvars)
00440 {
00441     double      max;
00442     st_table    *table;
00443     double      i;      
00444 
00445     background = manager->background;
00446     zero = Cudd_Not(manager->one);
00447     
00448     max = pow(2.0,(double)nvars);
00449     table = st_init_table(st_ptrcmp,st_ptrhash);
00450     if (table == NULL) {
00451         (void) fprintf(stdout,"out-of-memory, couldn't count DD minterms.\n");
00452         return((double)CUDD_OUT_OF_MEM);
00453     }
00454     i = ddCountMintermAux(node,max,table);
00455     st_foreach(table, cuddStCountfree, NULL);
00456     st_free_table(table);
00457     if (i == (double)CUDD_OUT_OF_MEM) {
00458         manager->errorCode = CUDD_MEMORY_OUT;
00459         (void) fprintf(stdout,"out-of-memory, couldn't count DD minterms.\n");
00460     }
00461     return(i);
00462 
00463 } /* end of Cudd_CountMinterm */

00517 DdNode *
00518 Cudd_Support(
00519   DdManager * dd /* manager */,
00520   DdNode * f /* DD whose support is sought */)
00521 {
00522     int *support;
00523     DdNode *res, *tmp, *var;
00524     int i,j;
00525     int size;
00526 
00527     /* Allocate and initialize support array for ddSupportStep. */
00528     size = ddMax(dd->size, dd->sizeZ);
00529     support = ALLOC(int,size);
00530     if (support == NULL) {
00531         dd->errorCode = CUDD_MEMORY_OUT;
00532         return(NULL);
00533     }
00534     for (i = 0; i < size; i++) {
00535         support[i] = 0;
00536     }
00537 
00538     /* Compute support and clean up markers. */
00539     ddSupportStep(Cudd_Regular(f),support);
00540     ddClearFlag(Cudd_Regular(f));
00541 
00542     /* Transform support from array to cube. */
00543     res = DD_ONE(dd);
00544     cuddRef(res);
00545     for (j = size - 1; j >= 0; j--) { /* for each level bottom-up */
00546         i = (j >= dd->size) ? j : dd->invperm[j];
00547         if (support[i] == 1) {
00548             var = cuddUniqueInter(dd,i,dd->one,Cudd_Not(dd->one));
00549             cuddRef(var);
00550             tmp = Cudd_bddAnd(dd,res,var);
00551             if (tmp == NULL) {
00552                 Cudd_RecursiveDeref(dd,res);
00553                 Cudd_RecursiveDeref(dd,var);
00554                 FREE(support);
00555                 return(NULL);
00556             }
00557             cuddRef(tmp);
00558             Cudd_RecursiveDeref(dd,res);
00559             Cudd_RecursiveDeref(dd,var);
00560             res = tmp;
00561         }
00562     }
00563 
00564     FREE(support);
00565     cuddDeref(res);
00566     return(res);
00567 
00568 } /* end of Cudd_Support */

00584 int
00585 Cudd_SupportSize(
00586   DdManager * dd /* manager */,
00587   DdNode * f /* DD whose support size is sought */)
00588 {
00589     int *support;
00590     int i;
00591     int size;
00592     int count;
00593 
00594     /* Allocate and initialize support array for ddSupportStep. */
00595     size = ddMax(dd->size, dd->sizeZ);
00596     support = ALLOC(int,size);
00597     if (support == NULL) {
00598         dd->errorCode = CUDD_MEMORY_OUT;
00599         return(CUDD_OUT_OF_MEM);
00600     }
00601     for (i = 0; i < size; i++) {
00602         support[i] = 0;
00603     }
00604 
00605     /* Compute support and clean up markers. */
00606     ddSupportStep(Cudd_Regular(f),support);
00607     ddClearFlag(Cudd_Regular(f));
00608 
00609     /* Count support variables. */
00610     count = 0;
00611     for (i = 0; i < size; i++) {
00612         if (support[i] == 1) count++;
00613     }
00614 
00615     FREE(support);
00616     return(count);
00617 
00618 } /* end of Cudd_SupportSize */

00635 DdNode *
00636 Cudd_VectorSupport(
00637   DdManager * dd /* manager */,
00638   DdNode ** F /* array of DDs whose support is sought */,
00639   int  n /* size of the array */)
00640 {
00641     int *support;
00642     DdNode *res, *tmp, *var;
00643     int i,j;
00644     int size;
00645 
00646     /* Allocate and initialize support array for ddSupportStep. */
00647     size = ddMax(dd->size, dd->sizeZ);
00648     support = ALLOC(int,size);
00649     if (support == NULL) {
00650         dd->errorCode = CUDD_MEMORY_OUT;
00651         return(NULL);
00652     }
00653     for (i = 0; i < size; i++) {
00654         support[i] = 0;
00655     }
00656 
00657     /* Compute support and clean up markers. */
00658     for (i = 0; i < n; i++) {
00659         ddSupportStep(Cudd_Regular(F[i]),support);
00660     }
00661     for (i = 0; i < n; i++) {
00662         ddClearFlag(Cudd_Regular(F[i]));
00663     }
00664 
00665     /* Transform support from array to cube. */
00666     res = DD_ONE(dd);
00667     cuddRef(res);
00668     for (j = size - 1; j >= 0; j--) { /* for each level bottom-up */
00669         i = (j >= dd->size) ? j : dd->invperm[j];
00670         if (support[i] == 1) {
00671             var = cuddUniqueInter(dd,i,dd->one,Cudd_Not(dd->one));
00672             cuddRef(var);
00673             tmp = Cudd_bddAnd(dd,res,var);
00674             if (tmp == NULL) {
00675                 Cudd_RecursiveDeref(dd,res);
00676                 Cudd_RecursiveDeref(dd,var);
00677                 FREE(support);
00678                 return(NULL);
00679             }
00680             cuddRef(tmp);
00681             Cudd_RecursiveDeref(dd,res);
00682             Cudd_RecursiveDeref(dd,var);
00683             res = tmp;
00684         }
00685     }
00686 
00687     FREE(support);
00688     cuddDeref(res);
00689     return(res);
00690 
00691 } /* end of Cudd_VectorSupport */

00708 int
00709 Cudd_VectorSupportSize(
00710   DdManager * dd /* manager */,
00711   DdNode ** F /* array of DDs whose support is sought */,
00712   int  n /* size of the array */)
00713 {
00714     int *support;
00715     int i;
00716     int size;
00717     int count;
00718 
00719     /* Allocate and initialize support array for ddSupportStep. */
00720     size = ddMax(dd->size, dd->sizeZ);
00721     support = ALLOC(int,size);
00722     if (support == NULL) {
00723         dd->errorCode = CUDD_MEMORY_OUT;
00724         return(CUDD_OUT_OF_MEM);
00725     }
00726     for (i = 0; i < size; i++) {
00727         support[i] = 0;
00728     }
00729 
00730     /* Compute support and clean up markers. */
00731     for (i = 0; i < n; i++) {
00732         ddSupportStep(Cudd_Regular(F[i]),support);
00733     }
00734     for (i = 0; i < n; i++) {
00735         ddClearFlag(Cudd_Regular(F[i]));
00736     }
00737 
00738     /* Count vriables in support. */
00739     count = 0;
00740     for (i = 0; i < size; i++) {
00741         if (support[i] == 1) count++;
00742     }
00743 
00744     FREE(support);
00745     return(count);
00746 
00747 } /* end of Cudd_VectorSupportSize */

00765 int
00766 Cudd_ClassifySupport(
00767   DdManager * dd /* manager */,
00768   DdNode * f /* first DD */,
00769   DdNode * g /* second DD */,
00770   DdNode ** common /* cube of shared variables */,
00771   DdNode ** onlyF /* cube of variables only in f */,
00772   DdNode ** onlyG /* cube of variables only in g */)
00773 {
00774     int *supportF, *supportG;
00775     DdNode *tmp, *var;
00776     int i,j;
00777     int size;
00778 
00779     /* Allocate and initialize support arrays for ddSupportStep. */
00780     size = ddMax(dd->size, dd->sizeZ);
00781     supportF = ALLOC(int,size);
00782     if (supportF == NULL) {
00783         dd->errorCode = CUDD_MEMORY_OUT;
00784         return(0);
00785     }
00786     supportG = ALLOC(int,size);
00787     if (supportG == NULL) {
00788         dd->errorCode = CUDD_MEMORY_OUT;
00789         FREE(supportF);
00790         return(0);
00791     }
00792     for (i = 0; i < size; i++) {
00793         supportF[i] = 0;
00794         supportG[i] = 0;
00795     }
00796 
00797     /* Compute supports and clean up markers. */
00798     ddSupportStep(Cudd_Regular(f),supportF);
00799     ddClearFlag(Cudd_Regular(f));
00800     ddSupportStep(Cudd_Regular(g),supportG);
00801     ddClearFlag(Cudd_Regular(g));
00802 
00803     /* Classify variables and create cubes. */
00804     *common = *onlyF = *onlyG = DD_ONE(dd);
00805     cuddRef(*common); cuddRef(*onlyF); cuddRef(*onlyG);
00806     for (j = size - 1; j >= 0; j--) { /* for each level bottom-up */
00807         i = (j >= dd->size) ? j : dd->invperm[j];
00808         if (supportF[i] == 0 && supportG[i] == 0) continue;
00809         var = cuddUniqueInter(dd,i,dd->one,Cudd_Not(dd->one));
00810         cuddRef(var);
00811         if (supportG[i] == 0) {
00812             tmp = Cudd_bddAnd(dd,*onlyF,var);
00813             if (tmp == NULL) {
00814                 Cudd_RecursiveDeref(dd,*common);
00815                 Cudd_RecursiveDeref(dd,*onlyF);
00816                 Cudd_RecursiveDeref(dd,*onlyG);
00817                 Cudd_RecursiveDeref(dd,var);
00818                 FREE(supportF); FREE(supportG);
00819                 return(0);
00820             }
00821             cuddRef(tmp);
00822             Cudd_RecursiveDeref(dd,*onlyF);
00823             *onlyF = tmp;
00824         } else if (supportF[i] == 0) {
00825             tmp = Cudd_bddAnd(dd,*onlyG,var);
00826             if (tmp == NULL) {
00827                 Cudd_RecursiveDeref(dd,*common);
00828                 Cudd_RecursiveDeref(dd,*onlyF);
00829                 Cudd_RecursiveDeref(dd,*onlyG);
00830                 Cudd_RecursiveDeref(dd,var);
00831                 FREE(supportF); FREE(supportG);
00832                 return(0);
00833             }
00834             cuddRef(tmp);
00835             Cudd_RecursiveDeref(dd,*onlyG);
00836             *onlyG = tmp;
00837         } else {
00838             tmp = Cudd_bddAnd(dd,*common,var);
00839             if (tmp == NULL) {
00840                 Cudd_RecursiveDeref(dd,*common);
00841                 Cudd_RecursiveDeref(dd,*onlyF);
00842                 Cudd_RecursiveDeref(dd,*onlyG);
00843                 Cudd_RecursiveDeref(dd,var);
00844                 FREE(supportF); FREE(supportG);
00845                 return(0);
00846             }
00847             cuddRef(tmp);
00848             Cudd_RecursiveDeref(dd,*common);
00849             *common = tmp;
00850         }
00851         Cudd_RecursiveDeref(dd,var);
00852     }
00853 
00854     FREE(supportF); FREE(supportG);
00855     cuddDeref(*common); cuddDeref(*onlyF); cuddDeref(*onlyG);
00856     return(1);
00857 
00858 } /* end of Cudd_ClassifySupport */

00886 
00901 int
00902 Cudd_bddPickOneCube(
00903   DdManager * ddm,
00904   DdNode * node,
00905   char * string)
00906 {
00907     DdNode *N, *T, *E;
00908     DdNode *one, *bzero;
00909     int    dir, i;
00910 
00911     if (string == NULL || node == NULL) return(0);
00912 
00913     /* The constant 0 function has no on-set cubes. */
00914     one = DD_ONE(ddm);
00915     bzero = Cudd_Not(one);
00916     if (node == bzero) return(0);
00917 
00918     for (i = 0; i < ddm->size; i++) string[i] = 2;
00919 
00920     if (node == DD_ONE(ddm)) return(1);
00921 
00922     for (;;) {
00923         N = Cudd_Regular(node);
00924         dir = (int) Cudd_Random() & 0x2000;
00925 
00926         T = cuddT(N);
00927         E = cuddE(N);
00928         if (Cudd_IsComplement(node)) {
00929             T = Cudd_Not(T);
00930             E = Cudd_Not(E);
00931         }
00932         if (T == one) {
00933             string[N->index] = 1;
00934             break;
00935         } else if (E == one) {
00936             string[N->index] = 0;
00937             break;
00938         } else if (T == bzero) {
00939             string[N->index] = 0;
00940             node = E;
00941         } else if (E == bzero) {
00942             string[N->index] = 1;
00943             node = T;
00944         } else {
00945             node = (dir != 0) ? T : E;
00946             string[N->index] = (dir != 0) ? 1 : 0;
00947         }
00948     }
00949     return(1);
00950 
00951 } /* end of Cudd_bddPickOneCube */
00952 
00953 
00977 DdNode *
00978 Cudd_bddPickOneMinterm(
00979   DdManager * dd /* manager */,
00980   DdNode * f /* function from which to pick one minterm */,
00981   DdNode ** vars /* array of variables */,
00982   int  n /* size of <code>vars</code> */)
00983 {
00984     char *string;
00985     int i, size;
00986     int *indices;
00987     int result;
00988     DdNode *zero, *old, *neW;
00989 
00990     size = dd->size;
00991     string = ALLOC(char, size);
00992     if (string == NULL) {
00993         dd->errorCode = CUDD_MEMORY_OUT;
00994         return(NULL);
00995     }
00996     indices = ALLOC(int,n);
00997     if (indices == NULL) {
00998         dd->errorCode = CUDD_MEMORY_OUT;
00999         FREE(string);
01000         return(NULL);
01001     }
01002 
01003     for (i = 0; i < n; i++) {
01004         indices[i] = vars[i]->index;
01005     }
01006 
01007     result = Cudd_bddPickOneCube(dd,f,string);
01008     if (result == 0) {
01009         FREE(string);
01010         FREE(indices);
01011         return(NULL);
01012     }
01013 
01014     /* Randomize choice for don't cares. */
01015     for (i = 0; i < n; i++) {
01016         if (string[indices[i]] == 2) 
01017             string[indices[i]] = (char) (Cudd_Random() & 0x20);
01018     }
01019 
01020     /* Build result BDD. */
01021     old = Cudd_ReadOne(dd);
01022     cuddRef(old);
01023     zero = Cudd_Not(Cudd_ReadOne(dd));
01024 
01025     for (i = 0; i < n; i++) {
01026         if (string[indices[i]] == 0) {
01027             neW = Cudd_bddIte(dd,old,Cudd_Not(vars[i]),zero);
01028         } else {
01029             neW = Cudd_bddIte(dd,old,vars[i],zero);
01030         }
01031         if (neW == NULL) {
01032             FREE(string);
01033             FREE(indices);
01034             Cudd_RecursiveDeref(dd,old);
01035             return(NULL);
01036         }
01037         cuddRef(neW);
01038         Cudd_RecursiveDeref(dd,old);
01039         old = neW;
01040     }
01041 
01042     /* Test. */
01043     if (Cudd_bddLeq(dd,old,f)) {
01044         cuddDeref(old);
01045     } else {
01046         Cudd_RecursiveDeref(dd,old);
01047         old = NULL;
01048     }
01049 
01050     FREE(string);
01051     FREE(indices);
01052     return(old);
01053 
01054 }  /* end of Cudd_bddPickOneMinterm */
01055 
01056 
01080 DdNode **
01081 Cudd_bddPickArbitraryMinterms(
01082   DdManager * dd /* manager */,
01083   DdNode * f /* function from which to pick one minterm */,
01084   DdNode ** vars /* array of variables */,
01085   int  n /* size of <code>vars</code> */,
01086   int  k /* number of minterms to find */)
01087 {
01088     char **string;
01089     int i, j, size;
01090     int *indices;
01091     int result;
01092     DdNode *zero, **old, *neW;
01093     double minterms;
01094     char *saveString;
01095     int saveFlag, savePoint = 0, isSame;
01096 
01097     minterms = Cudd_CountMinterm(dd,f,n);
01098     if ((double)k > minterms) {
01099         return(NULL);
01100     }
01101 
01102     size = dd->size;
01103     string = ALLOC(char *, k);
01104     if (string == NULL) {
01105         dd->errorCode = CUDD_MEMORY_OUT;
01106         return(NULL);
01107     }
01108     for (i = 0; i < k; i++) {
01109         string[i] = ALLOC(char, size + 1);
01110         if (string[i] == NULL) {
01111             for (j = 0; j < i; j++)
01112                 FREE(string[i]);
01113             FREE(string);
01114             dd->errorCode = CUDD_MEMORY_OUT;
01115             return(NULL);
01116         }
01117         for (j = 0; j < dd->size; j++) string[i][j] = '2';
01118         string[i][dd->size] = '\0';
01119     }
01120     indices = ALLOC(int,n);
01121     if (indices == NULL) {
01122         dd->errorCode = CUDD_MEMORY_OUT;
01123         FREE(string);
01124         return(NULL);
01125     }
01126 
01127     for (i = 0; i < n; i++) {
01128         indices[i] = vars[i]->index;
01129     }
01130 
01131     result = ddPickArbitraryMinterms(dd,f,n,k,string);
01132     if (result == 0) {
01133         for (i = 0; i < k; i++)
01134             FREE(string[i]);
01135         FREE(string);
01136         FREE(indices);
01137         return(NULL);
01138     }
01139 
01140     old = ALLOC(DdNode *, k);
01141     saveString = ALLOC(char, size + 1);
01142     saveFlag = 0;
01143 
01144     /* Build result BDD array. */
01145     for (i = 0; i < k; i++) {
01146         isSame = 0;
01147         if (!saveFlag) {
01148             if (i < k - 1) {
01149                 for (j = i + 1; j < k; j++) {
01150                     if (strcmp(string[i], string[j]) == 0) {
01151                         savePoint = i;
01152                         strcpy(saveString, string[i]);
01153                         saveFlag = 1;
01154                         break;
01155                     }
01156                 }
01157             }
01158         }
01159         else {
01160             if (strcmp(string[i], saveString) == 0)
01161                 isSame = 1;
01162             else {
01163                 saveFlag = 0;
01164                 if (i < k - 1) {
01165                     for (j = i + 1; j < k; j++) {
01166                         if (strcmp(string[i], string[j]) == 0) {
01167                             savePoint = i;
01168                             strcpy(saveString, string[i]);
01169                             saveFlag = 1;
01170                             break;
01171                         }
01172                     }
01173                 }
01174             }
01175         }
01176         /* Randomize choice for don't cares. */
01177         for (j = 0; j < n; j++) {
01178             if (string[i][indices[j]] == '2')
01179                 string[i][indices[j]] = (Cudd_Random() & 0x1) ? '1' : '0';
01180         }
01181 
01182         while (isSame) {
01183             isSame = 0;
01184             for (j = savePoint; j < i; j++) {
01185                 if (strcmp(string[i], string[j]) == 0) {
01186                     isSame = 1;
01187                     break;
01188                 }
01189             }
01190             if (isSame) {
01191                 strcpy(string[i], saveString);
01192                 /* Randomize choice for don't cares. */
01193                 for (j = 0; j < n; j++) {
01194                     if (string[i][indices[j]] == '2') 
01195                         string[i][indices[j]] = (Cudd_Random() & 0x1) ?
01196                             '1' : '0';
01197                 }
01198             }
01199         }
01200 
01201         old[i] = Cudd_ReadOne(dd);
01202         cuddRef(old[i]);
01203         zero = Cudd_Not(Cudd_ReadOne(dd));
01204 
01205         for (j = 0; j < n; j++) {
01206             if (string[i][indices[j]] == '0') {
01207                 neW = Cudd_bddIte(dd,old[i],Cudd_Not(vars[j]),zero);
01208             } else {
01209                 neW = Cudd_bddIte(dd,old[i],vars[j],zero);
01210             }
01211             if (neW == NULL) {
01212                 FREE(string);
01213                 FREE(indices);
01214                 Cudd_RecursiveDeref(dd,old[i]);
01215                 return(NULL);
01216             }
01217             cuddRef(neW);
01218             Cudd_RecursiveDeref(dd,old[i]);
01219             old[i] = neW;
01220         }
01221 
01222         /* Test. */
01223         if (Cudd_bddLeq(dd,old[i],f)) {
01224             cuddDeref(old[i]);
01225         } else {
01226             Cudd_RecursiveDeref(dd,old[i]);
01227             old[i] = NULL;
01228         }
01229     }
01230 
01231     FREE(saveString);
01232     for (i = 0; i < k; i++)
01233         FREE(string[i]);
01234     FREE(string);
01235     FREE(indices);
01236     return(old);
01237 
01238 }  /* end of Cudd_bddPickArbitraryMinterms */
01239 
01240 
01267 DdGen *
01268 Cudd_FirstCube(
01269   DdManager * dd,
01270   DdNode * f,
01271   int ** cube,
01272   CUDD_VALUE_TYPE * value)
01273 {
01274     DdGen *gen;
01275     DdNode *top, *treg, *next, *nreg, *prev, *preg;
01276     int i;
01277     int nvars;
01278 
01279     /* Sanity Check. */
01280     if (dd == NULL || f == NULL) return(NULL);
01281 
01282     /* Allocate generator an initialize it. */
01283     gen = ALLOC(DdGen,1);
01284     if (gen == NULL) {
01285         dd->errorCode = CUDD_MEMORY_OUT;
01286         return(NULL);
01287     }
01288 
01289     gen->manager = dd;
01290     gen->type = CUDD_GEN_CUBES;
01291     gen->status = CUDD_GEN_EMPTY;
01292     gen->gen.cubes.cube = NULL;
01293     gen->gen.cubes.value = DD_ZERO_VAL;
01294     gen->stack.sp = 0;
01295     gen->stack.stack = NULL;
01296     gen->node = NULL;
01297 
01298     nvars = dd->size;
01299     gen->gen.cubes.cube = ALLOC(int,nvars);
01300     if (gen->gen.cubes.cube == NULL) {
01301         dd->errorCode = CUDD_MEMORY_OUT;
01302         FREE(gen);
01303         return(NULL);
01304     }
01305     for (i = 0; i < nvars; i++) gen->gen.cubes.cube[i] = 2;
01306 
01307     /* The maximum stack depth is one plus the number of variables.
01308     ** because a path may have nods at all levels, including the
01309     ** constant level.
01310     */
01311     gen->stack.stack = ALLOC(DdNode *, nvars+1);
01312     if (gen->stack.stack == NULL) {
01313         dd->errorCode = CUDD_MEMORY_OUT;
01314         FREE(gen->gen.cubes.cube);
01315         FREE(gen);
01316         return(NULL);
01317     }
01318     for (i = 0; i <= nvars; i++) gen->stack.stack[i] = NULL;
01319 
01320     /* Find the first cube of the onset. */
01321     gen->stack.stack[gen->stack.sp] = f; gen->stack.sp++;
01322 
01323     while (1) {
01324         top = gen->stack.stack[gen->stack.sp-1];
01325         treg = Cudd_Regular(top);
01326         if (!cuddIsConstant(treg)) {
01327             /* Take the else branch first. */
01328             gen->gen.cubes.cube[treg->index] = 0;
01329             next = cuddE(treg);
01330             if (top != treg) next = Cudd_Not(next);
01331             gen->stack.stack[gen->stack.sp] = next; gen->stack.sp++;
01332         } else if (top == Cudd_Not(DD_ONE(dd)) || top == dd->background) {
01333             /* Backtrack */
01334             while (1) {
01335                 if (gen->stack.sp == 1) {
01336                     /* The current node has no predecessor. */
01337                     gen->status = CUDD_GEN_EMPTY;
01338                     gen->stack.sp--;
01339                     goto done;
01340                 }
01341                 prev = gen->stack.stack[gen->stack.sp-2];
01342                 preg = Cudd_Regular(prev);
01343                 nreg = cuddT(preg);
01344                 if (prev != preg) {next = Cudd_Not(nreg);} else {next = nreg;}
01345                 if (next != top) { /* follow the then branch next */
01346                     gen->gen.cubes.cube[preg->index] = 1;
01347                     gen->stack.stack[gen->stack.sp-1] = next;
01348                     break;
01349                 }
01350                 /* Pop the stack and try again. */
01351                 gen->gen.cubes.cube[preg->index] = 2;
01352                 gen->stack.sp--;
01353                 top = gen->stack.stack[gen->stack.sp-1];
01354                 treg = Cudd_Regular(top);
01355             }
01356         } else {
01357             gen->status = CUDD_GEN_NONEMPTY;
01358             gen->gen.cubes.value = cuddV(top);
01359             goto done;
01360         }
01361     }
01362 
01363 done:
01364     *cube = gen->gen.cubes.cube;
01365     *value = gen->gen.cubes.value;
01366     return(gen);
01367 
01368 } /* end of Cudd_FirstCube */
01369 
01370 
01386 int
01387 Cudd_NextCube(
01388   DdGen * gen,
01389   int ** cube,
01390   CUDD_VALUE_TYPE * value)
01391 {
01392     DdNode *top, *treg, *next, *nreg, *prev, *preg;
01393     DdManager *dd = gen->manager;
01394 
01395     /* Backtrack from previously reached terminal node. */
01396     while (1) {
01397         if (gen->stack.sp == 1) {
01398             /* The current node has no predecessor. */
01399             gen->status = CUDD_GEN_EMPTY;
01400             gen->stack.sp--;
01401             goto done;
01402         }
01403         top = gen->stack.stack[gen->stack.sp-1];
01404         treg = Cudd_Regular(top);
01405         prev = gen->stack.stack[gen->stack.sp-2];
01406         preg = Cudd_Regular(prev);
01407         nreg = cuddT(preg);
01408         if (prev != preg) {next = Cudd_Not(nreg);} else {next = nreg;}
01409         if (next != top) { /* follow the then branch next */
01410             gen->gen.cubes.cube[preg->index] = 1;
01411             gen->stack.stack[gen->stack.sp-1] = next;
01412             break;
01413         }
01414         /* Pop the stack and try again. */
01415         gen->gen.cubes.cube[preg->index] = 2;
01416         gen->stack.sp--;
01417     }
01418 
01419     while (1) {
01420         top = gen->stack.stack[gen->stack.sp-1];
01421         treg = Cudd_Regular(top);
01422         if (!cuddIsConstant(treg)) {
01423             /* Take the else branch first. */
01424             gen->gen.cubes.cube[treg->index] = 0;
01425             next = cuddE(treg);
01426             if (top != treg) next = Cudd_Not(next);
01427             gen->stack.stack[gen->stack.sp] = next; gen->stack.sp++;
01428         } else if (top == Cudd_Not(DD_ONE(dd)) || top == dd->background) {
01429             /* Backtrack */
01430             while (1) {
01431                 if (gen->stack.sp == 1) {
01432                     /* The current node has no predecessor. */
01433                     gen->status = CUDD_GEN_EMPTY;
01434                     gen->stack.sp--;
01435                     goto done;
01436                 }
01437                 prev = gen->stack.stack[gen->stack.sp-2];
01438                 preg = Cudd_Regular(prev);
01439                 nreg = cuddT(preg);
01440                 if (prev != preg) {next = Cudd_Not(nreg);} else {next = nreg;}
01441                 if (next != top) { /* follow the then branch next */
01442                     gen->gen.cubes.cube[preg->index] = 1;
01443                     gen->stack.stack[gen->stack.sp-1] = next;
01444                     break;
01445                 }
01446                 /* Pop the stack and try again. */
01447                 gen->gen.cubes.cube[preg->index] = 2;
01448                 gen->stack.sp--;
01449                 top = gen->stack.stack[gen->stack.sp-1];
01450                 treg = Cudd_Regular(top);
01451             }
01452         } else {
01453             gen->status = CUDD_GEN_NONEMPTY;
01454             gen->gen.cubes.value = cuddV(top);
01455             goto done;
01456         }
01457     }
01458 
01459 done:
01460     if (gen->status == CUDD_GEN_EMPTY) return(0);
01461     *cube = gen->gen.cubes.cube;
01462     *value = gen->gen.cubes.value;
01463     return(1);
01464 
01465 } /* end of Cudd_NextCube */
01466 
01467 
01483 DdNode *
01484 Cudd_bddComputeCube(
01485   DdManager * dd,
01486   DdNode ** vars,
01487   int * phase,
01488   int  n)
01489 {
01490     DdNode      *cube;
01491     DdNode      *fn;
01492     int         i;
01493 
01494     cube = DD_ONE(dd);
01495     cuddRef(cube);
01496 
01497     for (i = n - 1; i >= 0; i--) {
01498         if (phase == NULL || phase[i] != 0) {
01499             fn = Cudd_bddAnd(dd,vars[i],cube);
01500         } else {
01501             fn = Cudd_bddAnd(dd,Cudd_Not(vars[i]),cube);
01502         }
01503         if (fn == NULL) {
01504             Cudd_RecursiveDeref(dd,cube);
01505             return(NULL);
01506         }
01507         cuddRef(fn);
01508         Cudd_RecursiveDeref(dd,cube);
01509         cube = fn;
01510     }
01511     cuddDeref(cube);
01512 
01513     return(cube);
01514 
01515 }  /* end of Cudd_bddComputeCube */
01516 
01517 
01533 DdNode *
01534 Cudd_addComputeCube(
01535   DdManager * dd,
01536   DdNode ** vars,
01537   int * phase,
01538   int  n)
01539 {
01540     DdNode      *cube, *zero;
01541     DdNode      *fn;
01542     int         i;
01543 
01544     cube = DD_ONE(dd);
01545     cuddRef(cube);
01546     zero = DD_ZERO(dd);
01547 
01548     for (i = n - 1; i >= 0; i--) {
01549         if (phase == NULL || phase[i] != 0) {
01550             fn = Cudd_addIte(dd,vars[i],cube,zero);
01551         } else {
01552             fn = Cudd_addIte(dd,vars[i],zero,cube);
01553         }
01554         if (fn == NULL) {
01555             Cudd_RecursiveDeref(dd,cube);
01556             return(NULL);
01557         }
01558         cuddRef(fn);
01559         Cudd_RecursiveDeref(dd,cube);
01560         cube = fn;
01561     }
01562     cuddDeref(cube);
01563 
01564     return(cube);
01565 
01566 } /* end of Cudd_addComputeCube */
01567 
01568 
01584 DdGen *
01585 Cudd_FirstNode(
01586   DdManager * dd,
01587   DdNode * f,
01588   DdNode ** node)
01589 {
01590     DdGen *gen;
01591     int retval;
01592 
01593     /* Sanity Check. */
01594     if (dd == NULL || f == NULL) return(NULL);
01595 
01596     /* Allocate generator an initialize it. */
01597     gen = ALLOC(DdGen,1);
01598     if (gen == NULL) {
01599         dd->errorCode = CUDD_MEMORY_OUT;
01600         return(NULL);
01601     }
01602 
01603     gen->manager = dd;
01604     gen->type = CUDD_GEN_NODES;
01605     gen->status = CUDD_GEN_EMPTY;
01606     gen->gen.nodes.visited = NULL;
01607     gen->gen.nodes.stGen = NULL;
01608     gen->stack.sp = 0;
01609     gen->stack.stack = NULL;
01610     gen->node = NULL;
01611 
01612     gen->gen.nodes.visited = st_init_table(st_ptrcmp,st_ptrhash);
01613     if (gen->gen.nodes.visited == NULL) {
01614         FREE(gen);
01615         return(NULL);
01616     }
01617 
01618     /* Collect all the nodes in a st table for later perusal. */
01619     retval = cuddCollectNodes(Cudd_Regular(f),gen->gen.nodes.visited);
01620     if (retval == 0) {
01621         st_free_table(gen->gen.nodes.visited);
01622         FREE(gen);
01623         return(NULL);
01624     }
01625 
01626     /* Initialize the st table generator. */
01627     gen->gen.nodes.stGen = st_init_gen(gen->gen.nodes.visited);
01628     if (gen->gen.nodes.stGen == NULL) {
01629         st_free_table(gen->gen.nodes.visited);
01630         FREE(gen);
01631         return(NULL);
01632     }
01633 
01634     /* Find the first node. */
01635     retval = st_gen(gen->gen.nodes.stGen, (char **) &(gen->node), NULL);
01636     if (retval != 0) {
01637         gen->status = CUDD_GEN_NONEMPTY;
01638         *node = gen->node;
01639     }
01640 
01641     return(gen);
01642 
01643 } /* end of Cudd_FirstNode */
01644 
01645 
01659 int
01660 Cudd_NextNode(
01661   DdGen * gen,
01662   DdNode ** node)
01663 {
01664     int retval;
01665 
01666     /* Find the next node. */
01667     retval = st_gen(gen->gen.nodes.stGen, (char **) &(gen->node), NULL);
01668     if (retval == 0) {
01669         gen->status = CUDD_GEN_EMPTY;
01670     } else {
01671         *node = gen->node;
01672     }
01673 
01674     return(retval);
01675 
01676 } /* end of Cudd_NextNode */
01677 
01678 
01692 int
01693 Cudd_GenFree(
01694   DdGen * gen)
01695 {
01696 
01697     if (gen == NULL) return(0);
01698     switch (gen->type) {
01699     case CUDD_GEN_CUBES:
01700         FREE(gen->gen.cubes.cube);
01701         FREE(gen->stack.stack);
01702         break;
01703     case CUDD_GEN_NODES:
01704         st_free_gen(gen->gen.nodes.stGen);
01705         st_free_table(gen->gen.nodes.visited);
01706         break;
01707     default:
01708         return(0);
01709     }
01710     FREE(gen);
01711     return(0);
01712 
01713 } /* end of Cudd_GenFree */
01714 
01715 
01729 int
01730 Cudd_IsGenEmpty(
01731   DdGen * gen)
01732 {
01733     if (gen == NULL) return(1);
01734     return(gen->status == CUDD_GEN_EMPTY);
01735 
01736 } /* end of Cudd_IsGenEmpty */
01737 
01738 
01751 DdNode *
01752 Cudd_IndicesToCube(
01753   DdManager * dd,
01754   int * array,
01755   int  n)
01756 {
01757     DdNode *cube, *tmp;
01758     int i;
01759 
01760     cube = DD_ONE(dd);
01761     cuddRef(cube);
01762     for (i = n - 1; i >= 0; i--) {
01763         tmp = Cudd_bddAnd(dd,Cudd_bddIthVar(dd,array[i]),cube);
01764         if (tmp == NULL) {
01765             Cudd_RecursiveDeref(dd,cube);
01766             return(NULL);
01767         }
01768         cuddRef(tmp);
01769         Cudd_RecursiveDeref(dd,cube);
01770         cube = tmp;
01771     }
01772 
01773     cuddDeref(cube);
01774     return(cube);
01775 
01776 } /* end of Cudd_IndicesToCube */
01777 
01778 
01790 void
01791 Cudd_PrintVersion(
01792   FILE * fp)
01793 {
01794     (void) fprintf(fp, "%s\n", CUDD_VERSION);
01795 
01796 } /* end of Cudd_PrintVersion */
01797 
01798 
01812 double
01813 Cudd_AverageDistance(
01814   DdManager * dd)
01815 {
01816     double tetotal, nexttotal;
01817     double tesubtotal, nextsubtotal;
01818     double temeasured, nextmeasured;
01819     int i, j;
01820     int slots, nvars;
01821     long diff;
01822     DdNode *scan;
01823 #ifdef __osf__
01824 #pragma pointer_size save
01825 #pragma pointer_size short
01826 #endif
01827     DdNode **nodelist;
01828 #ifdef __osf__
01829 #pragma pointer_size restore
01830 #endif
01831 
01832     nvars = dd->size;
01833     if (nvars == 0) return(0.0);
01834 
01835     /* Initialize totals. */
01836     tetotal = 0.0;
01837     nexttotal = 0.0;
01838     temeasured = 0.0;
01839     nextmeasured = 0.0;
01840 
01841     /* Scan the variable subtables. */
01842     for (i = 0; i < nvars; i++) {
01843         nodelist = dd->subtables[i].nodelist;
01844         tesubtotal = 0.0;
01845         nextsubtotal = 0.0;
01846         slots = dd->subtables[i].slots;
01847         for (j = 0; j < slots; j++) {
01848             scan = nodelist[j];
01849             while (scan != NULL) {
01850                 diff = (long) scan - (long) cuddT(scan);
01851                 tesubtotal += (double) ddAbs(diff);
01852                 diff = (long) scan - (long) Cudd_Regular(cuddE(scan));
01853                 tesubtotal += (double) ddAbs(diff);
01854                 temeasured += 2.0;
01855                 if (scan->next != NULL) {
01856                     diff = (long) scan - (long) scan->next;
01857                     nextsubtotal += (double) ddAbs(diff);
01858                     nextmeasured += 1.0;
01859                 }
01860                 scan = scan->next;
01861             }
01862         }
01863         tetotal += tesubtotal;
01864         nexttotal += nextsubtotal;
01865     }
01866 
01867     /* Scan the constant table. */
01868     nodelist = dd->constants.nodelist;
01869     nextsubtotal = 0.0;
01870     slots = dd->constants.slots;
01871     for (j = 0; j < slots; j++) {
01872         scan = nodelist[j];
01873         while (scan != NULL) {
01874             if (scan->next != NULL) {
01875                 diff = (long) scan - (long) scan->next;
01876                 nextsubtotal += (double) ddAbs(diff);
01877                 nextmeasured += 1.0;
01878             }
01879             scan = scan->next;
01880         }
01881     }
01882     nexttotal += nextsubtotal;
01883 
01884     return((tetotal + nexttotal) / (temeasured + nextmeasured));
01885 
01886 } /* end of Cudd_AverageDistance */
01887 
01888 
01906 long
01907 Cudd_Random(
01908    )
01909 {
01910     int i;      /* index in the shuffle table */
01911     long int w; /* work variable */
01912 
01913     /* cuddRand == 0 if the geneartor has not been initialized yet. */
01914     if (cuddRand == 0) Cudd_Srandom(1);
01915 
01916     /* Compute cuddRand = (cuddRand * LEQA1) % MODULUS1 avoiding
01917     ** overflows by Schrage's method.
01918     */
01919     w          = cuddRand / LEQQ1;
01920     cuddRand   = LEQA1 * (cuddRand - w * LEQQ1) - w * LEQR1;
01921     cuddRand  += (cuddRand < 0) * MODULUS1;
01922 
01923     /* Compute cuddRand2 = (cuddRand2 * LEQA2) % MODULUS2 avoiding
01924     ** overflows by Schrage's method.
01925     */
01926     w          = cuddRand2 / LEQQ2;
01927     cuddRand2  = LEQA2 * (cuddRand2 - w * LEQQ2) - w * LEQR2;
01928     cuddRand2 += (cuddRand2 < 0) * MODULUS2;
01929 
01930     /* cuddRand is shuffled with the Bays-Durham algorithm.
01931     ** shuffleSelect and cuddRand2 are combined to generate the output.
01932     */
01933 
01934     /* Pick one element from the shuffle table; "i" will be in the range
01935     ** from 0 to STAB_SIZE-1.
01936     */
01937     i = (int) (shuffleSelect / STAB_DIV);
01938     /* Mix the element of the shuffle table with the current iterate of
01939     ** the second sub-generator, and replace the chosen element of the
01940     ** shuffle table with the current iterate of the first sub-generator.
01941     */
01942     shuffleSelect   = shuffleTable[i] - cuddRand2;
01943     shuffleTable[i] = cuddRand;
01944     shuffleSelect  += (shuffleSelect < 1) * (MODULUS1 - 1);
01945     /* Since shuffleSelect != 0, and we want to be able to return 0,
01946     ** here we subtract 1 before returning.
01947     */
01948     return(shuffleSelect - 1);
01949 
01950 } /* end of Cudd_Random */
01951 
01952 
01969 void
01970 Cudd_Srandom(
01971   long  seed)
01972 {
01973     int i;
01974 
01975     if (seed < 0)       cuddRand = -seed;
01976     else if (seed == 0) cuddRand = 1;
01977     else                cuddRand = seed;
01978     cuddRand2 = cuddRand;
01979     /* Load the shuffle table (after 11 warm-ups). */
01980     for (i = 0; i < STAB_SIZE + 11; i++) {
01981         long int w;
01982         w = cuddRand / LEQQ1;
01983         cuddRand = LEQA1 * (cuddRand - w * LEQQ1) - w * LEQR1;
01984         cuddRand += (cuddRand < 0) * MODULUS1;
01985         shuffleTable[i % STAB_SIZE] = cuddRand;
01986     }
01987     shuffleSelect = shuffleTable[1 % STAB_SIZE];
01988 
01989 } /* end of Cudd_Srandom */
01990 
01991 
02007 double
02008 Cudd_Density(
02009   DdManager * dd /* manager */,
02010   DdNode * f /* function whose density is sought */,
02011   int  nvars /* size of the support of f */)
02012 {
02013     double minterms;
02014     int nodes;
02015     double density;
02016 
02017     if (nvars == 0) nvars = dd->size;
02018     minterms = Cudd_CountMinterm(dd,f,nvars);
02019     if (minterms == (double) CUDD_OUT_OF_MEM) return(minterms);
02020     nodes = Cudd_DagSize(f);
02021     density = minterms / (double) nodes;
02022     return(density);
02023 
02024 } /* end of Cudd_Density */
02025 
02026 
02042 void
02043 Cudd_OutOfMem(
02044   long size /* size of the allocation that failed */)
02045 {
02046     (void) fflush(stdout);
02047     (void) fprintf(stderr, "\nunable to allocate %ld bytes\n", size);
02048     return;
02049 
02050 } /* end of Cudd_OutOfMem */

02053 /*---------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
02054 /* Definition of internal functions                                          */
02055 /*---------------------------------------------------------------------------*/

02057 
02071 int
02072 cuddP(
02073   DdManager * dd,
02074   DdNode * f)
02075 {
02076     int retval;
02077     st_table *table = st_init_table(st_ptrcmp,st_ptrhash);
02078 
02079     if (table == NULL) return(0);
02080 
02081     retval = dp2(f,table);
02082     st_free_table(table);
02083     (void) fputc('\n',stdout);
02084     return(retval);
02085 
02086 } /* end of cuddP */

02088 
02100 enum st_retval
02101 cuddStCountfree(
02102   char * key,
02103   char * value,
02104   char * arg)
02105 {
02106     double      *d;
02107 
02108     d = (double *)value;
02109     FREE(d);
02110     return(ST_CONTINUE);
02111 
02112 } /* end of cuddStCountfree */
02113 
02114 
02130 int
02131 cuddCollectNodes(
02132   DdNode * f,
02133   st_table * visited)
02134 {
02135     DdNode      *T, *E;
02136     int         retval;
02137 
02138 #ifdef DD_DEBUG
02139     assert(!Cudd_IsComplement(f));
02140 #endif
02141 
02142     /* If already visited, nothing to do. */
02143     if (st_is_member(visited, (char *) f) == 1)
02144         return(1);
02145 
02146     /* Check for abnormal condition that should never happen. */
02147     if (f == NULL)
02148         return(0);
02149 
02150     /* Mark node as visited. */
02151     if (st_add_direct(visited, (char *) f, NULL) == ST_OUT_OF_MEM)
02152         return(0);
02153 
02154     /* Check terminal case. */
02155     if (cuddIsConstant(f))
02156         return(1);
02157 
02158     /* Recursive calls. */
02159     T = cuddT(f);
02160     retval = cuddCollectNodes(T,visited);
02161     if (retval != 1) return(retval);
02162     E = Cudd_Regular(cuddE(f));
02163     retval = cuddCollectNodes(E,visited);
02164     return(retval);
02165 
02166 } /* end of cuddCollectNodes */
02167 
02168 
02169 /*---------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
02170 /* Definition of static functions                                            */
02171 /*---------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
02172 
02173 
02184 static int
02185 dp2(
02186   DdNode * f,
02187   st_table * t)
02188 {
02189     DdNode *g, *n, *N;
02190     int T,E;
02191     
02192     if (f == NULL) {
02193         return(0);
02194     }
02195     g = Cudd_Regular(f);
02196     if (cuddIsConstant(g)) {
02197 #if SIZEOF_VOID_P == 8
02198         (void) fprintf(stdout,"ID = %c0x%lx\tvalue = %-9g\n", bang(f),
02199                 (unsigned long) g / (unsigned long) sizeof(DdNode),cuddV(g));
02200 #else
02201         (void) fprintf(stdout,"ID = %c0x%x\tvalue = %-9g\n", bang(f),
02202                 (unsigned) g / (unsigned) sizeof(DdNode),cuddV(g));
02203 #endif
02204         return(1);
02205     }
02206     if (st_is_member(t,(char *) g) == 1) {
02207         return(1);
02208     }
02209     if (st_add_direct(t,(char *) g,NULL) == ST_OUT_OF_MEM)
02210         return(0);
02211 #ifdef DD_STATS
02212 #if SIZEOF_VOID_P == 8
02213     (void) fprintf(stdout,"ID = %c0x%lx\tindex = %d\tr = %d\t", bang(f),
02214                 (unsigned long) g / (unsigned long) sizeof(DdNode), g->index, g->ref);
02215 #else
02216     (void) fprintf(stdout,"ID = %c0x%x\tindex = %d\tr = %d\t", bang(f),
02217                 (unsigned) g / (unsigned) sizeof(DdNode),g->index,g->ref);
02218 #endif
02219 #else
02220 #if SIZEOF_VOID_P == 8
02221     (void) fprintf(stdout,"ID = %c0x%lx\tindex = %d\t", bang(f),
02222                 (unsigned long) g / (unsigned long) sizeof(DdNode),g->index);
02223 #else
02224     (void) fprintf(stdout,"ID = %c0x%x\tindex = %d\t", bang(f),
02225                 (unsigned) g / (unsigned) sizeof(DdNode),g->index);
02226 #endif
02227 #endif
02228     n = cuddT(g);
02229     if (cuddIsConstant(n)) {
02230         (void) fprintf(stdout,"T = %-9g\t",cuddV(n));
02231         T = 1;
02232     } else {
02233 #if SIZEOF_VOID_P == 8
02234         (void) fprintf(stdout,"T = 0x%lx\t",(unsigned long) n / (unsigned long) sizeof(DdNode));
02235 #else
02236         (void) fprintf(stdout,"T = 0x%x\t",(unsigned) n / (unsigned) sizeof(DdNode));
02237 #endif
02238         T = 0;
02239     }
02240 
02241     n = cuddE(g);
02242     N = Cudd_Regular(n);
02243     if (cuddIsConstant(N)) {
02244         (void) fprintf(stdout,"E = %c%-9g\n",bang(n),cuddV(N));
02245         E = 1;
02246     } else {
02247 #if SIZEOF_VOID_P == 8
02248         (void) fprintf(stdout,"E = %c0x%lx\n", bang(n), (unsigned long) N/(unsigned long) sizeof(DdNode));
02249 #else
02250         (void) fprintf(stdout,"E = %c0x%x\n", bang(n), (unsigned) N/(unsigned) sizeof(DdNode));
02251 #endif
02252         E = 0;
02253     }
02254     if (E == 0) {
02255         if (dp2(N,t) == 0)
02256             return(0);
02257     }
02258     if (T == 0) {
02259         if (dp2(cuddT(g),t) == 0)
02260             return(0);
02261     }
02262     return(1);
02263 
02264 } /* end of dp2 */
02265 
02266 
02276 static void
02277 ddPrintMintermAux(
02278   DdManager * dd /* manager */,
02279   DdNode * node /* current node */,
02280   int * list /* current recursion path */)
02281 {
02282     DdNode      *N,*Nv,*Nnv;
02283     int         i,v,index;
02284 
02285     N = Cudd_Regular(node);
02286 
02287     if (cuddIsConstant(N)) {
02288         /* Terminal case: Print one cube based on the current recursion
02289         ** path, unless we have reached the background value (ADDs) or
02290         ** the logical zero (BDDs).
02291         */
02292         if (node != background && node != zero) {
02293             for (i = 0; i < dd->size; i++) {
02294                 v = list[i];
02295                 if (v == 0) (void) fprintf(stdout,"0");
02296                 else if (v == 1) (void) fprintf(stdout,"1");
02297                 else (void) fprintf(stdout,"-");
02298             }
02299             (void) fprintf(stdout," % g\n", cuddV(node));
02300         }
02301     } else {
02302         Nv  = cuddT(N);
02303         Nnv = cuddE(N);
02304         if (Cudd_IsComplement(node)) {
02305             Nv  = Cudd_Not(Nv);
02306             Nnv = Cudd_Not(Nnv);
02307         }
02308         index = N->index;
02309         list[index] = 0;
02310         ddPrintMintermAux(dd,Nnv,list); 
02311         list[index] = 1;
02312         ddPrintMintermAux(dd,Nv,list);
02313         list[index] = 2;
02314     }
02315     return;
02316 
02317 } /* end of ddPrintMintermAux */
02318 
02319 
02330 static int
02331 ddDagInt(
02332   DdNode * n)
02333 {
02334     int tval, eval;
02335 
02336     if (Cudd_IsComplement(n->next)) {
02337         return(0);
02338     }
02339     n->next = Cudd_Not(n->next);
02340     if (cuddIsConstant(n)) {
02341         return(1);
02342     }
02343     tval = ddDagInt(cuddT(n));
02344     eval = ddDagInt(Cudd_Regular(cuddE(n)));
02345     return(1 + tval + eval);
02346 
02347 } /* end of ddDagInt */
02348 
02349 
02365 static int
02366 cuddEstimateCofactor(
02367   DdManager *dd,
02368   st_table *table,
02369   DdNode * node,
02370   int i,
02371   int phase,
02372   DdNode ** ptr)
02373 {
02374     int tval, eval, val;
02375     DdNode *ptrT, *ptrE;
02376 
02377     if (Cudd_IsComplement(node->next)) {
02378         if (!st_lookup(table,(char *)node,(char **)ptr)) {
02379             st_add_direct(table,(char *)node,(char *)node);
02380             *ptr = node;
02381         }
02382         return(0);
02383     }
02384     node->next = Cudd_Not(node->next);
02385     if (cuddIsConstant(node)) {
02386         *ptr = node;
02387         if (st_add_direct(table,(char *)node,(char *)node) == ST_OUT_OF_MEM)
02388             return(CUDD_OUT_OF_MEM);
02389         return(1);
02390     }
02391     if ((int) node->index == i) {
02392         if (phase == 1) {
02393             *ptr = cuddT(node);
02394             val = ddDagInt(cuddT(node));
02395         } else {
02396             *ptr = cuddE(node);
02397             val = ddDagInt(Cudd_Regular(cuddE(node)));
02398         }
02399         if (node->ref > 1) {
02400             if (st_add_direct(table,(char *)node,(char *)*ptr) ==
02401                 ST_OUT_OF_MEM)
02402                 return(CUDD_OUT_OF_MEM);
02403         }
02404         return(val);
02405     }
02406     if (dd->perm[node->index] > dd->perm[i]) {
02407         *ptr = node;
02408         tval = ddDagInt(cuddT(node));
02409         eval = ddDagInt(Cudd_Regular(cuddE(node)));
02410         if (node->ref > 1) {
02411             if (st_add_direct(table,(char *)node,(char *)node) ==
02412                 ST_OUT_OF_MEM)
02413                 return(CUDD_OUT_OF_MEM);
02414         }
02415         val = 1 + tval + eval;
02416         return(val);
02417     }
02418     tval = cuddEstimateCofactor(dd,table,cuddT(node),i,phase,&ptrT);
02419     eval = cuddEstimateCofactor(dd,table,Cudd_Regular(cuddE(node)),i,
02420                                 phase,&ptrE);
02421     ptrE = Cudd_NotCond(ptrE,Cudd_IsComplement(cuddE(node)));
02422     if (ptrT == ptrE) {         /* recombination */
02423         *ptr = ptrT;
02424         val = tval;
02425         if (node->ref > 1) {
02426             if (st_add_direct(table,(char *)node,(char *)*ptr) ==
02427                     ST_OUT_OF_MEM)
02428                 return(CUDD_OUT_OF_MEM);
02429         }
02430     } else if ((ptrT != cuddT(node) || ptrE != cuddE(node)) &&
02431                (*ptr = cuddUniqueLookup(dd,node->index,ptrT,ptrE)) != NULL) {
02432         if (Cudd_IsComplement((*ptr)->next)) {
02433             val = 0;
02434         } else {
02435             val = 1 + tval + eval;
02436         }
02437         if (node->ref > 1) {
02438             if (st_add_direct(table,(char *)node,(char *)*ptr) ==
02439                     ST_OUT_OF_MEM)
02440                 return(CUDD_OUT_OF_MEM);
02441         }
02442     } else {
02443         *ptr = node;
02444         val = 1 + tval + eval;
02445     }
02446     return(val);
02447 
02448 } /* end of cuddEstimateCofactor */
02449 
02450 
02463 static DdNode *
02464 cuddUniqueLookup(
02465   DdManager * unique,
02466   int  index,
02467   DdNode * T,
02468   DdNode * E)
02469 {
02470     int posn;
02471     unsigned int level;
02472 #ifdef __osf__
02473 #pragma pointer_size save
02474 #pragma pointer_size short
02475 #endif
02476     DdNode **nodelist;
02477     DdNode *looking;
02478     DdSubtable *subtable;
02479 #ifdef __osf__
02480 #pragma pointer_size restore
02481 #endif
02482 
02483     if (index >= unique->size) {
02484         return(NULL);
02485     }
02486 
02487     level = unique->perm[index];
02488     subtable = &(unique->subtables[level]);
02489 
02490 #ifdef DD_DEBUG
02491     assert(level < (unsigned) cuddI(unique,T->index));
02492     assert(level < (unsigned) cuddI(unique,Cudd_Regular(E)->index));
02493 #endif
02494 
02495     posn = ddHash(T, E, subtable->shift);
02496     nodelist = subtable->nodelist;
02497     looking = nodelist[posn];
02498 
02499     while (looking != NULL) {
02500         if (cuddT(looking) == T && cuddE(looking) == E) {
02501             return(looking);
02502         }
02503         looking = Cudd_Regular(looking->next);
02504     }
02505 
02506     return(NULL);
02507 
02508 } /* end of cuddUniqueLookup */
02509 
02510 
02526 static int
02527 cuddEstimateCofactorSimple(
02528   DdNode * node,
02529   int i)
02530 {
02531     int tval, eval;
02532 
02533     if (Cudd_IsComplement(node->next)) {
02534         return(0);
02535     }
02536     node->next = Cudd_Not(node->next);
02537     if (cuddIsConstant(node)) {
02538         return(1);
02539     }
02540     tval = cuddEstimateCofactorSimple(cuddT(node),i);
02541     if ((int) node->index == i) return(tval);
02542     eval = cuddEstimateCofactorSimple(Cudd_Regular(cuddE(node)),i);
02543     return(1 + tval + eval);
02544 
02545 } /* end of cuddEstimateCofactorSimple */
02546 
02547 
02566 static double
02567 ddCountMintermAux(
02568   DdNode * node,
02569   double  max,
02570   st_table * table)
02571 {
02572     DdNode      *N, *Nv, *Nnv;
02573     double      min, *pmin, min1, min2;
02574     double      *dummy;
02575 
02576     N = Cudd_Regular(node);
02577 
02578     if (cuddIsConstant(N)) {
02579         if (node == background || node == zero) {
02580             return(0.0);
02581         } else {
02582             return(max);
02583         }
02584     }
02585     if (st_lookup(table, (char *)node, (char **)&dummy)) {
02586         min = *dummy;
02587         return(min);
02588     }
02589 
02590     Nv = cuddT(N); Nnv = cuddE(N);
02591     if (Cudd_IsComplement(node)) {
02592         Nv = Cudd_Not(Nv); Nnv = Cudd_Not(Nnv);
02593     }
02594 
02595     min1 = ddCountMintermAux(Nv, max,table) / 2.0;
02596     if (min1 == (double)CUDD_OUT_OF_MEM) return((double)CUDD_OUT_OF_MEM);
02597     min2 = ddCountMintermAux(Nnv,max,table) / 2.0;
02598     if (min2 == (double)CUDD_OUT_OF_MEM) return((double)CUDD_OUT_OF_MEM);
02599     min = min1 + min2;
02600     
02601     pmin = ALLOC(double,1);
02602     if (pmin == NULL) {
02603         return((double)CUDD_OUT_OF_MEM);
02604     }
02605 
02606     *pmin = min;
02607 
02608     if (st_add_direct(table,(char *)node, (char *)pmin) == ST_OUT_OF_MEM) {
02609         FREE(pmin);
02610         return((double)CUDD_OUT_OF_MEM);
02611     }
02612     return(min);
02613 
02614 } /* end of ddCountMintermAux */
02615 
02616 
02634 static double
02635 ddCountPathAux(
02636   DdNode * node,
02637   st_table * table)
02638 {
02639 
02640     DdNode      *Nv, *Nnv;
02641     double      paths, *ppaths, paths1, paths2;
02642     double      *dummy;
02643 
02644 
02645     if (cuddIsConstant(node)) {
02646         return(1.0);
02647     }
02648     if (st_lookup(table, (char *)node, (char **)&dummy)) {
02649         paths = *dummy;
02650         return(paths);
02651     }
02652 
02653     Nv = cuddT(node); Nnv = cuddE(node);
02654 
02655     paths1 = ddCountPathAux(Nv,table);
02656     if (paths1 == (double)CUDD_OUT_OF_MEM) return((double)CUDD_OUT_OF_MEM);
02657     paths2 = ddCountPathAux(Cudd_Regular(Nnv),table);
02658     if (paths2 == (double)CUDD_OUT_OF_MEM) return((double)CUDD_OUT_OF_MEM);
02659     paths = paths1 + paths2;
02660     
02661     ppaths = ALLOC(double,1);
02662     if (ppaths == NULL) {
02663         return((double)CUDD_OUT_OF_MEM);
02664     }
02665 
02666     *ppaths = paths;
02667 
02668     if (st_add_direct(table,(char *)node, (char *)ppaths) == ST_OUT_OF_MEM) {
02669         FREE(ppaths);
02670         return((double)CUDD_OUT_OF_MEM);
02671     }
02672     return(paths);
02673 
02674 } /* end of ddCountPathAux */
02675 
02676 
02690 static void
02691 ddSupportStep(
02692   DdNode * f,
02693   int * support)
02694 {
02695     if (cuddIsConstant(f) || Cudd_IsComplement(f->next)) {
02696         return;
02697     }
02698 
02699     support[f->index] = 1;
02700     ddSupportStep(cuddT(f),support);
02701     ddSupportStep(Cudd_Regular(cuddE(f)),support);
02702     /* Mark as visited. */
02703     f->next = Cudd_Not(f->next);
02704     return;
02705 
02706 } /* end of ddSupportStep */
02707 
02708 
02721 static void
02722 ddClearFlag(
02723   DdNode * f)
02724 {
02725     if (!Cudd_IsComplement(f->next)) {
02726         return;
02727     }
02728     /* Clear visited flag. */
02729     f->next = Cudd_Regular(f->next);
02730     if (cuddIsConstant(f)) {
02731         return;
02732     }
02733     ddClearFlag(cuddT(f));
02734     ddClearFlag(Cudd_Regular(cuddE(f)));
02735     return;
02736 
02737 } /* end of ddClearFlag */
02738 
02739 
02750 static int
02751 ddLeavesInt(
02752   DdNode * n)
02753 {
02754     int tval, eval;
02755 
02756     if (Cudd_IsComplement(n->next)) {
02757         return(0);
02758     }
02759     n->next = Cudd_Not(n->next);
02760     if (cuddIsConstant(n)) {
02761         return(1);
02762     }
02763     tval = ddLeavesInt(cuddT(n));
02764     eval = ddLeavesInt(Cudd_Regular(cuddE(n)));
02765     return(tval + eval);
02766 
02767 } /* end of ddLeavesInt */
02768 
02769 
02779 static int
02780 ddPickArbitraryMinterms(
02781   DdManager *dd,
02782   DdNode *node,
02783   int nvars,
02784   int nminterms,
02785   char **string)
02786 {
02787     DdNode *N, *T, *E;
02788     DdNode *one, *bzero;
02789     int    i, t, result;
02790     double min1, min2;
02791 
02792     if (string == NULL || node == NULL) return(0);
02793 
02794     /* The constant 0 function has no on-set cubes. */
02795     one = DD_ONE(dd);
02796     bzero = Cudd_Not(one);
02797     if (nminterms == 0 || node == bzero) return(1);
02798     if (node == one) {
02799         return(1);
02800     }
02801 
02802     N = Cudd_Regular(node);
02803     T = cuddT(N); E = cuddE(N);
02804     if (Cudd_IsComplement(node)) {
02805         T = Cudd_Not(T); E = Cudd_Not(E);
02806     }
02807 
02808     min1 = Cudd_CountMinterm(dd, T, nvars) / 2.0;
02809     if (min1 == (double)CUDD_OUT_OF_MEM) return(0);
02810     min2 = Cudd_CountMinterm(dd, E, nvars) / 2.0;
02811     if (min2 == (double)CUDD_OUT_OF_MEM) return(0);
02812 
02813     t = (int)((double)nminterms * min1 / (min1 + min2) + 0.5);
02814     for (i = 0; i < t; i++)
02815         string[i][N->index] = '1';
02816     for (i = t; i < nminterms; i++)
02817         string[i][N->index] = '0';
02818 
02819     result = ddPickArbitraryMinterms(dd,T,nvars,t,&string[0]);
02820     if (result == 0)
02821         return(0);
02822     result = ddPickArbitraryMinterms(dd,E,nvars,nminterms-t,&string[t]);
02823     return(result);
02824 }
Generated on Sat Aug 30 17:58:07 2014 for libbdd by  1.4.7
